About.developed: This user interface is developed as open-source software.
About.patchnotes: Changes in the monitoring for this build

CHANNELS.SAVE_DESCRIPTION: Saving the configuration will overwrite the existing one for this {{edgeShortName}} and will be applied on page reload.

Key.KEY_TYPO_MESSAGE_HINT:
Note: When entering the licence key, watch out for possible typos:
  • small L "l" vs. capital i "I"
  • zero "0" vs. capital o "O"
We always recommend copying the licence key from the delivery note and pasting it into the field above instead of typing it in manually.
Key.alreadyRegisteredDifferentApp:
Key was already registered for an app on this system!
If you continue, the other registration will be removed.
Key.alreadyRegisteredDifferentSystem: Key already got registered on a different System! If you continue the other registration will get removed.
Key.enterKey: Enter the license key you received with the order of the app
Key.failedLoadingRegisterKey: failed to get already registered Keys

App.NAME: App Center
App.header: The App Manager is currently in a first test version.
App.updateAvailable: There is a new {{ edgeShortName }} version available! Please update the {{ edgeShortName }} so that all new {{ edgeShortName }} Apps are displayed in the App Center.

PROFILE.ERROR_DOWNLOADING_MODBUS_PROTOCOL: Error while downloading the Modbus Protocol

Scheduler.contact: This shouldn't happen. Please contact {{ value }}.

EmergencyReserve.InfoForEmergencyReserveSlider: By activating the emergency power reserve, the value can be freely selected between 5% and 100%.

Energymonitor.ERROR_TEMPORARY: Error while fetching data. Please try again later.
Energymonitor.ERROR_TOO_LONG: The display of the data is partly not possible due to reconstruction work on our servers. Your data for this period is not lost. Alternatively, it is still possible to view the historical data via local monitoring. We ask for your understanding.
Energymonitor.title: Energy monitor

RETROFITTING.INFORMATION_FOR_INSTANT_START: The battery is charged or discharged at maximum power in order to reach a state of charge of {{targetSoc}} % as quickly as possible for an expansion. This can result in grid consumption or grid feed-in. This state of charge is maintained for {{targetTimeBuffer}} minutes, after which, or after the capacity has been expanded, the storage system returns to its regular operating state.
RETROFITTING.INFORMATION_FOR_PlANNED_EXPANSION: The battery is expected to be charged/discharged from {{targetTime}} on {{targetDate}} to reach reach {{targetSoc}} % state of charge for the planned expansion. In the process there may be grid consumption or grid feed-in. This state of charge is maintained for {{targetTimeBuffer}} minutes, after which or after the capacity expansion, the storage system returns to the regular operating state.
RETROFITTING.INFORMATION_FOR_PlANNED_EXPANSION_INVALI: The battery is expected to be charged/discharged to reach {{targetSoc}} % state of charge for the planned expansion.
RETROFITTING.UPDATE_TO_NEW_VERSION: Update to the newest version to be able to use the battery retrofitting feature.

DelayedSellToGrid.relationError: Charge limit must be greater than the Discharge limit

Administration.customCarInfo: If this is the case, your car can only be charged efficiently from a certain output. With this button, this is included in your configuration options as well as in the automatic charging calculations.
Administration.renaultZoe: Is a Renault Zoe mainly charged on this charging station?

ForceChargeMode.info: In this mode the loading of the car is enforced, i.e. it is always guaranteed that the car will be charged, even if the charging station needs to access grid power.
ForceChargeMode.maxChargingDetails: If the car can not load the entered maximum value, the power will be automatically limited.
ForceChargeMode.name: Force charging

NoConnection.description: No connection to the charging station.
NoConnection.help1: Check if the charging station is switched on and can be reached via the network.
NoConnection.help1_1: The IP of the charging station appears when switching on again

ChargingPriority.info: Depending on the prioritization, the selected component will be loaded first

OptimizedChargeMode.info: In this mode, the load of the car is adjusted to the current production and consumption.
OptimizedChargeMode.minInfo: If you want to prevent that the car is not charging at the night, you could set a minimum charge.
OptimizedChargeMode.name: Optimized charging

EVCS.Uncontrollable: This charging station can not be controlled.
EVCS.chargingStationPluggedInEVLocked: Charing Station + E-Vehicel plugged in + locked
EVCS.clusterConfigError: An error has occurred in the configuration of the Evcs cluster
EVCS.energySinceBeginning: Energy since the last charge start

History.batteryChargeGridLimitDescription: The maximum grid feed-in, above which battery charging is increased (as far as possible) is below the maximum permitted grid feed-in in order to prevent premature production curtailment.
History.priorityDescription: The minimum charge has a higher priority than the maximum charge

HIGH.functionDescription: Comparatively later charging of the storage
HIGH.pvCurtail: Higher probability of avoiding PV system curtailment
HIGH.storageDescription: Lower probability that the memory will become full

High.functionDescription: Comparatively later charging of the storage system
High.pvCurtail: Higher probability that the curtailment of the PV system will be avoided
High.storageDescription: Less probability that the storage system will be fully charged

LOW.functionDescription: Comparatively early charging of the storage
LOW.pvCurtail: Lower likelihood of avoiding PV system curtailment
LOW.storageDescription: Higher probability that the storage will be fully charged

Low.functionDescription: Comparatively early charging of the storage system
Low.pvCurtail: Lower probability that curtailment of the PV system will be avoided
Low.storageDescription: Higher chance that the storage system will be fully charged

MEDIUM.functionDescription: Comparatively uniform charging of the storage
MEDIUM.pvCurtail: High probability of avoiding PV system curtailment
MEDIUM.storageDescription: High probability that the reservoir will be fully charged

Medium.functionDescription: Comparatively even charging of the store system
Medium.pvCurtail: High probability that the curtailment of the PV system will be avoided
Medium.storageDescription: High probability that the storage system will be fully charged

State.noLimitPossible: No limitation possible (restricted by controls with higher priority)
State.passedEndTime: End time of limited charging exceeded

GridOptimizedCharge.endTimeDescription: The charging does not take place with the maximum amount for a few hours, but steadily over a longer period of time.
GridOptimizedCharge.endTimeDetailedDescription: The charging does not take place with the maximum amount for a few hours, but steadily with a maximum of {{ value1 }} to {{ value2 }} o'clock.
GridOptimizedCharge.expectedSocWithoutSellToGridLimit: Without avoiding the maximum grid feed-in
GridOptimizedCharge.settingOnlyVisableForInstaller: This setting is only visible to the installer

HeatPump.aboveSoc: and from the state of charge of
HeatPump.belowSoc: and below state of charge of
HeatPump.moreThanHpPower: The value must not be lower than the maximum output of the heat pump
HeatPump.moreThanMaxPower: Value must not be lower than maximum power of the heat pump
HeatPump.relationError: Switch-on command excess value must be greater than switch-on recommended value

Widgets.InfoStorageForCharge: Negative values correspond to storage charging
Widgets.InfoStorageForDischarge: Positive values correspond to storage discharge

Peakshaving.asymmetricInfo: The entered performance values ​​refer to individual phases. It is adjusted to the most stressed phase.
Peakshaving.relationError: Discharge limit must be greater than or equal to the charge limit

Singlethreshold.moreThanMaxPower: Value must not be lower than the maximum power of the controlled device
Singlethreshold.relationError: Threshold must be greater than the switched load power

Widgets.autarchyInfo: Autarky indicates the percentage of current power that can be covered by generation and storage discharge.
Widgets.phasesInfo: For technical reasons, the sum of the individual phases can be slightly different from the total sum.
Widgets.selfconsumptionInfo: Self-consumption indicates the percentage of the currently generated output that can be used by direct consumption and storage charging.
Widgets.twoWayInfoGrid: Negative values correspond to grid feed-in, Positive values correspond to mains supply

Network.errorReadingConfiguration: Error reading the current network configuration:
Network.validAddressWarning: In 'Add static IP addresses', Please enter valid ip address with subnetmask e.g. 10.4.1.6/24

General.SystemOutage: Due to maintenance work the online monitoring is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later. For more information see

Login.REQUEST_TIMEOUT: Request timed out. Try again later.
Login.preamble: Please enter your password or submit the default value to login as a guest.
Login.title: Login

SYSTEM_UPDATE.LATEST_VERISON: The system is up to date with the latest software
